verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Holy is the arm that saved me
Full of mercy, and love divine
Reaching to the lowest valley
Bringing peace to this heart of mine

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
He has carried away my iniquities
As far as the west from the east
He has carried away my iniquities
So I sing Hallelujah, I sing (x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Worthy, is the lamb who saved me
The Lamb was holy, The Lamb was slain
Washed me, by the precious mountain
White as snow is my crimson stain
